root.message: The DATA_AVAILABILITY field for indicator 6-4-2, translated into all languages

languages.language:
# Data Availability ## Description Countries (2010 to present): Asia and Pacific 2 Africa 6 Latin America and the Caribbean 16 Europe, North America, Australia, New Zealand and Japan 24
Countries (2000-2009): Asia and Pacific 42 Africa 49 Latin America and the Caribbean 27 Europe, North America, Australia, New Zealand and Japan 47
